items.q: Air has a tendency to ____________________ (expand / expansion) when it is heated.
Entering the correct PIN is ____________________ (required / requirement) in order to access the database.
Sugary foods are a good source of quick ____________________ (energy / energetic).
The ocean is one of the most ____________________ (power / powerful) forces of nature.
A tropical storm can be a ____________________ (threatened / threatening) event, especially for people near the ocean.
Taking a cycling tour is an ____________________ (enjoyable / enjoyment) way to spend the day while you're in Paris.
Please turn to page 35 in your textbook to see an ____________________ (illustration / illustrated) of the scientific method.
Leah easily ____________________ (recognizable / recognized) the thief in the photos that the police officer showed her.
Many crops, such as apples, onions, and pumpkins, are ____________________ (dependent / dependable) on bees.
I contacted my former ____________________ (employment / employer) for a letter of recommendation.
Some of the most challenging mountains to climb in the world are Annapurna, Nanga Parbat, and K2. ____________________
If the library doesn't have the book you need, they can request it from a different library. ____________________
The computer software company will seek three recent college graduates to hire. ____________________
An easy way to transform a room is to paint it a new color. ____________________
There were a couple items on your shopping list that I was not able to find. ____________________
The project can only proceed if it receives more funding. a. stop b. purchase c. explain
There are numerous restaurants, parks, and museums in my city which make it an excellent tourist destination. a. illogical b. flexible c. sole
Although Mark's speech was brief , his points were clear and persuasive. a. long b. selfish c. mysterious
We'll go out of business soon if we don't start making a profit . a. loss b. wisdom c. game
The instructions to build the desk were too complex , so I hired a carpenter to do it. a. simple b. colorful c. immature
The neighbor's dog didn't have its yearly vaccinate yet, but it's not too late . a. didn't have b. vaccinate c. late
The moon's gravitational pull control the earth's high and low tides . a. gravitational b. control c. tides
They don't make enough money and can't pay for their children's needy . a. don't make b. can't pay c. needy
Most of the students in the class get a ride to school every day, but some of them takes public transportation . a. get b. takes c. transportation
My brother and his family needs a new car to accommodate their four children and two dogs. a. needs b. accommodate c. children
Lisa's favorite basketball team is going to the state champion next month. a. favorite b. is c. champion
All of the passengers needs to show their boarding passes at the gate. a. needs b. show c. boarding
The elderly couple who lives across the street from us were on television last night. a. elderly b. were c. last
The purposeful of this workshop is to learn how to repair tables and other kinds of large furniture. a. purposeful b. is c. large
You'll need to use the bathroom upstairs because the one on the first floor is being remodel . a. need b. upstairs c. remodel
_____ these circumstances
the sole _____
bear in _____
_____ from 1 to 10
_____ forward to
develop _____
in _____ of
_____ shopping
_____ research
my hard work paid _____
Most of the people in my office ____________________ (speak) at least one other language besides English.
That pair of shoes ____________________ (cost) less at the store near my house.
The main article on the front page of today's newspaper ____________________ (be) definitely worth reading.
The committee ____________________ (need) at least eighty percent of its members present before they can take a vote.
None of the items on the menu ____________________ (look) appetizing to me.
Absences due to sickness, in addition to transportation problems, ____________________ (have) caused Maria to have very low attendance this year.
Several passages of the legal document ____________________ (be) quite complex, and I'd like to have the help of a lawyer to interpret them.
Watching old episodes of my favorite TV show always ____________________ (make) me feel better when I'm in a bad mood.
My friends who work at the pizzeria downtown ____________________ (get) a discount on any food they purchase there.
Apple pie, my favorite dessert, always ____________________ (remind) me of my grandmother.
The purpose of a process essay is to explain a method, or how to do something, to achieve a particular result. __________
An appropriate topic for a process essay would be how to make friends in a new city or country. __________
A good thesis statement in a process essay will include details for every step involved in the process. __________
The most common way of organizing a process essay is chronologically, in time or step order. __________
Some common transitions and connectors in a process essay are likewise , in contrast , and similarly . __________
Explain how to get a good grade in a course you are taking. Use effective transitions and connectors in your process essay.
